page.title: 13ASHILL CLUBS (1)
page.content: Ashill prides itself on the number of activities organised within the parish for the benefit of the inhabitants, they range from a{Mother and Baby club to the{Golden Link}(a pensioners club). Mother and Baby members meet on Wednesday afternoons at the community centre and while mums chat and have tea the youngsters learn to play with one another. Three mornings a week the {Playgroup}meet in the community centre, youngsters from 3 to 5 sing, paint, play etc. in a useful early introduction to school type activities. At 4 yrs old{Ashill School of Dancing take children Thursday evenings to teach them dance steps, balance and gentle physical exercise (Fee 40p) this is followed by{Adults Keep Fit (gentle exercise for about 20 women).
